Summary Out of the box thinker. Developing and implementing an Ecosystem-centric business suited to the development of disruptive technologies. Goal is to contribute to address global challenges.  
 
Objective is to build with scientists with industrialists and investors, a new deal between established companies and innovators, in order to work on developing a new Energy and beyond Energy, key technologies about basic resources. 
 
"Sharing economy" is applied to the development of a market in order to get actors with mutual self-interest to join in the LENR-Cities initiative.

Experiments are been done with Xewow and SASW companies during several years
